entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character who is trying to escape from under the window.

entities.name: Dursleys
entities.description: The family that Harry lives with and has a strained relationship with. They are mentioned as being in their living room.

entities.name: Aunt Petunia
entities.description: One of the members of the Dursley family who is mentioned as screaming loudly.

entities.name: cat
entities.description: A cat that streaks out from under a parked car and flies out of sight.

entities.name: street
entities.description: The location where Harry is trying to escape to.

relationships.description: Harry and the Dursleys have a strained relationship, as indicated by the loud noise coming from their living room.
The cat is under the parked car when it streaks out.
Harry's head collides with the Dursleys' open window.
Aunt Petunia screams loudly when Harry's head collides with the window.
